title: YT releases value-packed alloy version of Capra enduro bike
content:
The current generation YT Capra enduro bike is now available with an alloy frameset with prices starting at £2,399 / €3,499 / $2,699 for the YT Capra Base AL.

The Capra AL is available with either 29in or 27.5in wheel options and in sizes ranging from S through to XXL, depending on the wheel size. The geometry of the new bike remains unchanged compared to the carbon version of the Capra.

YT Industries

The latest generation of the Capra was released in 2018. At the time, our tester remarked how the “geometry ticks all the right boxes with no weird quirks or boundary-pushing numbers”, adding that “it didn’t take long to feel at home on the Capra”.

Trends in geometry have moved on since then and, while the 460mm reach figure on a size large isn’t exactly short, it’s not quite as long as some of its modern contemporaries.

  • The ultimate guide to mountain bike geometry and handling

With that in mind, YT says that owing to the bike’s short seat-tube and low standover height, most riders will be able to choose a size based on personal preference – for example, shorter riders who prefer a longer reach should be able to size up provided they can get their seat low enough.

Either way, there is still a strong contingent of riders who prefer the less juggernaut-like ride quality of the very longest and slackest bikes out there and, for them, they will likely get on well with the Capra AL.

YT Industries

The 29in version of the bike features 170mm travel front and rear, while the 27.5in version boosts that figure to 180mm.

The YT Capra Pro AL and Base AL share the same frame with specs changed to suit each price point.

2021 YT Capra AL Pro spec overview

YT Industries
  • Fork: Fox 38 Float Performance Elite (44mm offset 27.5in/51mm offset 29in)
  • Shock: Fox Float DPX2 Performance Elite
  • Headset: Acros AZX-576
  • Stem: E13 Plus 35, 50mm
  • Handlebar: E13 Plus 35, 800mm
  • Grips: Odi Elite Motion V2.1
  • Crankset: SRAM Descendant 7K, 32t, 170mm
  • Chainguide: E13 TRS Plus
  • Derailleur: SRAM GX Eagle
  • Shifter: SRAM GX Eagle
  • Wheels: DT Swiss E 1900 Spline
  • Tyres: Maxxis Assegai / Maxxis Minion DHR II, Dual Compound EXO TR
  • Brakes: SRAM Code R
  • Seatpost: YT Postman
  • Saddle: SDG Bel Air 3.0
  • Price: £3,199 / €3,499 / $3,499

2021 YT Capra AL Base spec overview

YT Industries
  • Fork: RockShox Zeb Charger R (44mm offset 27.5in/51mm offset 29in)
  • Shock: RockShox Super Deluxe
  • Headset: Acros AZX-576
  • Stem: E13 Base 35, 50mm
  • Handlebar: E13 Base 35, 800mm
  • Grips: Odi Elite Motion V2.1
  • Crankset: SRAM Descendant 6K, 32t, 170mm
  • Chainguide: E13 TRS Plus
  • Derailleur: SRAM SX Eagle
  • Shifter: SRAM SX Eagle
  • Wheels: DT Swiss E 1900 Spline
  • Tyres: Maxxis Assegai / Maxxis Minion DHR II, Dual Compound EXO TR
  • Brakes: SRAM Code R
  • Seatpost: YT Postman
  • Saddle: SDG Bel Air 3.0
  • Price: £2,399 / €2,699 / $2,699
author: Jack Luke
